meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the October 8, 2024 City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Meeting
Action Item: Resolution for 2929 Wycliff
agenda_items.description: A multifamily residential development located at 2929 Wycliff Avenue in the City of Dallas, Dallas County, Texas 75219. Consider and adopt partnership resolutions approving the form and substance of and authorizing the execution and delivery of documents and instruments necessary to carry out the financing and operation of 2929 Wycliff.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution for Waterford at Goldmark
agenda_items.description: A multifamily residential development located at 13695 Goldmark Drive in the City of Dallas, Dallas County, Texas 75240. Consider and adopt a financing resolution authorizing the issuance, sale and delivery of the City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Multifamily Housing Revenue Notes.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution for The Hartford Living
agenda_items.description: Located at 400 North St. Paul Street in the City of Dallas, Dallas County, Texas 75201, and to be converted to a multifamily residential development. Consider and adopt a resolution approving a Memorandum of Understanding with Blue Lofts, Inc.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution for The Ridge at Loop 12
agenda_items.description: To be located at 1200 North Walton Walker Boulevard in the City of Dallas, Dallas County, Texas 75211. Consider and adopt a resolution approving a Memorandum of Understanding with LDG Multifamily, LLC.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution to terminate the Memorandum of Understanding between the Corporation and Opportunity Housing Group, Inc.
agenda_items.description: Relating to 555 Ross, a multifamily residential development located at 1777 N Record Street, City of Dallas, Dallas County, Texas 75020.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution to terminate the Memorandum of Understanding between the Corporation and Jefferson at the Central, LLC
agenda_items.description: Relating to Jefferson Innova, a multifamily residential development located at 2781 N. Carroll Avenue, City of Dallas, Dallas County, Texas 75204.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee Special Called Meeting
agenda_items.description: Regarding operation and governance of the Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report
agenda_items.description: For the eight-month period ending on August 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report
